    End of Semester Potluck

  • Mar30

    NUWIT's Website Hack Day

    March 30, 2019 @ 11:00am - 4:00pm309 Kariotis Hall

    NUWIT's annual Website Hack Day will be hosted on Saturday, March 30th from 11am to 4pm in 309 Kariotis Hall. Come learn some web development basics and start to build your own personal website! You'll work through HTML/CSS and Bootstrap exercises, and then have free hacking time to work on your website (mentors will be available). No web experience is necessary. Lunch will be served!
